Title: Shredder Shutdown
Description:
That no-good Trade Prince Gallywix somehow managed to stow the whole Steamwheedle Sharks footbomb team away on the yacht. I didn't even see any of them!

Now he has them doing his dirty work here at the lumber yard. $n, you're the $g guy : gal; who won the championship for us back home on Kezan. You've got to get rid of them!
CompletionText: Looks like you might need to tackle one or two more of those Sharks.
RewardText: I can't say that I was ever much of a footbomb fan, but you're giving me an appreciation for the game!
